data.englishTranslation: Praise is to Allah Who has clothed me with this (garment) and provided it for me, though I was powerless myself and incapable.
data.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee kasaanee haathaa (aththawba) wa razaqaneehi min ghayri hawlim-minnee wa laa quwwatin.
data.arabicVerse: الْحَمْدُ لِلّهِ الَّذِي كَسَانِي هَذَا (الثَّوْبَ) وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَـيـْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُـوَّةٍ
data.reference: [Hisnul 5] [Al-Bukhari, Muslim, Abu Dawud, Ibn Majah, At-Tirmizi, 'Irwa'ul-Ghalil 7/47.]
